block.p: REICHEL-Josephine. Manhattan Day School/Yeshiva Ohr Torah records with profound sorrow the passing of Josephine Reichel, wife of our esteemed Board of Education Chairman, Rabbi O. Asher Reichel. May the entire family be comforted in this hour of their untimely loss. Manhattan Day School/ Yeshiva Ohr Torah Rabbi Mordechai Besser, Principal George Karasick, President Elliott Gibber, Chairman of the Board
